long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fast and effective solution for Appsumo customers to download a list of all your product purchases to a CSV along with detailed descriptions, category information, links to your invoice and more. This extension is part of the Smarter App Tracker from The Smarterpreneur (smarterapptracker.com) and requires a license for use.
